pages.text: $(o)"I see nothing but light, nothing but glory, nothing but a sun, all souls, a throne and a ray of radiance! The Sun is not the first, but the Sun is the highest, and it's bright. The Sun almost rules over all other gods, and will take what it needs to let herself glow a bit longer."$()

pages.title: Symbol
pages.text: This symbol is created with a $(l:shaping/entry_splendor)Splendorous Eye$() in the $(l:glory/entry_rite_glorious)Glorious Rite$().$(br)The symbol can be linked to an altar, and will supply the $(marked)Light$() aspect.
